channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Regulators open inquiry into University of Greater Manchester amid fraud claims
item.description: University is already being investigated by police over ‘allegations of financial irregularities’ and has suspended three of its senior staff The Univ...

item.title: Farage criticises BBC over racism allegations and claims some fellow pupils say he was ‘offensive’ but not racist – UK politics live
item.description: Reform leader claims he has had letters of support over racism allegations, but that those letters also described some of his comments as offensive Ni...

item.title: Almost half of Americans say cost of living is ‘worst it’s ever been’, new poll finds – live
item.description: Trump said earlier this week that the issue of affordability for Americans is a ‘fake narrative’ conjured by Democrats Among the beneficiaries of Dona...

item.title: Outcry in Italy over sex education bill to crack down on ‘gender ideology’
item.description: Legislation is needed to stop leftwing politicians ‘bringing drag queens and porn actors into schools’, minister says A restrictive sex education bill...

item.title: Macron reportedly warned European leaders ‘there is a chance that the US will betray Ukraine’ – Europe live
item.description: German magazine Der Spiegel has reported the warning, quoting a leaked note from a recent call between the European leaders But on a more serious note...

item.title: Trump and Infantino - too close for comfort?
item.description: Friday’s World Cup draw in Washington DC will be the latest illustration of the ever-closer relationship between US President Donald Trump and Fifa pr...

item.title: Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi
item.description: BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India.

item.title: Man accused of driving synagogue attacker to UK defence site charged with terror offences
item.description: Greater Manchester Police confirms the 31-year-old was an associate of Jihad Al-Shamie.

item.title: Streeting orders review into rising demand for mental health and ADHD services
item.description: The review will look at increased pressure on the NHS and whether there is any evidence of over-diagnosis.

item.title: A baby seal walks into a bar...
item.description: A bar in Richmond, New Zealand had a surprise visitor when the marine mammal popped in.
